description:
Burly all-terrain wheels and a large handle converts your EXO GearWarrior Basket into a fully functional gear cart. Tool-free assembly that snaps together in a matter of seconds.

  • Easily connects while the GearWarrior is still on your hitch
  • Carrying capacity 110lbs
  • Remove when vehicle is moving
  • Must have either EXO SwingBase or EXO TopShelf (sold separately)
  • Attaches to the EXO GearWarrior or other Yakima Warrior baskets (sold separately)
name: Yakima Exo WarriorWheels Basket Cart Kit
